snippet: The JX35 misses most of its marks. Its bland performance makes the Acura MDX and Lexus RX feel like sport sedans by comparison. And its undisciplined design is a riot of swoops and lines that go everywhere and nowhere.
abstract: The JX35 misses most of its marks. Its bland performance makes the Acura MDX and Lexus RX feel like sport sedans by comparison. And its undisciplined design is a riot of swoops and lines that go everywhere and nowhere.
